00069 template <typename ConcreteClass,
00070          typename BaseClass,
00071          typename Options>
00072  BaseClass* RegistryProxyMaker(Options* opts){return new ConcreteClass(opts);};
00073 
00074 template <typename ConcreteClass,
00075          typename BaseClass,
00076          typename Options,
00077          typename Factory> 
00078 class RegistryProxy{
00079   public: 
00080     RegistryProxy(const char* Name, const char* ArgumentNames) 
00081     { 
00082       Factory *f = Factory::Instance(); 
00083       f->registerModule( Name , &RegistryProxyMaker<ConcreteClass,BaseClass,Options>); 
00084       /* Add all the arguments to the manager */
00085       f->addArguments( ArgumentNames);
00086     }
00087 };
